frontmatter.title: Delivery
frontmatter.meta_title: MStore Magento the complete mobile commerce app by React native
frontmatter.meta_description: You are shop-owners of physical stores with high-traffic consumers and think to go digital. Or you are online shop-owners with E-Commerce websites. Both of you want to maximize sale opportunities

markdownRemark.html:
Auto delivery via Cebuilder

Open the Cebuilder and select the delivery tab, then add the bundle Identifer or Android package name. Click the button to open the terminal scripts

Manually delivery via the expo tools

  • Build the ipa file for the iOs app, run this script:

    expo build:ios

  • Build the apk file for the Android app, run this script:

    expo build:android
